thread.title: Trump: It Would Be Great if U.S., Russia Could ‘Get Along’

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump: It Would Be Great if U.S., Russia Could ‘Get Along’
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he wishes the U.S. could “get along” with Russia, as he met at the White House with leaders of Baltic states who recently voiced concerns about what they describe as Russian aggression.
“We want to be able to get along with Russia,” Mr. Trump said. “If we got along with Russia, that would be a good thing, not a bad thing. And just about everybody agrees with that, except very stupid people.”
